function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possible airborne transmission of COVID-19 in patient rooms","Impact":"Increased risk of healthcare workers and patients contracting COVID-19","Mitigation":"Conduct in vivo experiments to assess generation of airborne size carrier aerosols and viability fraction of embedded virus, implement disinfection technologies","Technologies":"In vivo experiments, disinfection technologies (e.g., vaporized hydrogen peroxide, UV irradiation)","People":"Patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, research institutions"},{"Description":"Shortage of supply chain for critical PPE","Impact":"Increased risk of healthcare workers contracting COVID-19 due to lack of protective equipment","Mitigation":"Implement eco-friendly technologies for reprocessing PPE (e.g., vaporized hydrogen peroxide, UV irradiation)","Technologies":"Vaporized hydrogen peroxide, UV irradiation","People":"Healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, suppliers, manufacturers"}]}
